title: Payment Agent: Withdraw (request)
description: Initiate a withdrawal to an approved Payment Agent.

amount.description: The amount to withdraw to the payment agent.

description.description: [Optional] Remarks about the withdraw. Only letters, numbers, space, period, comma, - ' are allowed.

dry_run.description: [Optional] If set to 1, just do validation.

paymentagent_loginid.description: The payment agent loginid received from the `paymentagent_list` call.

verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a `verify_email` call, which must be done first)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
